Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  views: 1 to modify

Views:
  ~ active_employees

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW active_employees AS
 SELECT
    status,
    count(*) AS employee_count,
    avg(salary) AS avg_salary
   FROM employees
  WHERE status = 'active'
  GROUP BY status
  HAVING avg(salary) > 50000::pg_catalog.numeric
  ORDER BY employee_count, avg_salary DESC;
